title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5329.31 - Duties to give evidence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5329.31 - Duties to give evidence

State Regulations

It shall be the duty of each operator and each employee
or other person associated with each such licensee to report promptly when
requested or ordered to do so by any official of the commission in furtherance
of an investigation or hearing pursuant to this Title and to testify under oath
concerning any facts within such licensee's or such person's knowledge and to
produce any books, records, written matter or other evidence within such
licensee's or such person's possession or control relevant to such
matter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5329.31

Adopted

New

York State Register June 26, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 26, eff. 6/26/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
